effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to put the target to sleep. If the user is a meloetta, it will toggle between Aria and Pirouette Forme.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to put the target to sleep. If the user is a meloetta, it will toggle between Aria and Pirouette Forme.

short_effect.black_white: Has a 10% chance to put the target to sleep.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 10% chance to put the target to sleep.

flavor_text.black_white: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of those listening. It may also induce sleep.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of those listening. It may also induce sleep.
